ISSUE.TITLE: `now projects ...` works, but `now project` does not
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When removing a project ``` $ now projects rm ... The project: nodejs will be removed permanently. It will also delete everything under the project including deployments. > Are you sure? [y/N] ``` but ``` $ now project rm ... > Error! The specified file or directory "project" does not exist. ``` By convention, both should wortk.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Update `clipboardy` to v2.1.0 (#2737) Fixes #564. Related to #1924.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [now projects] Add subcommand alias for `now project` Fixes #2162.
[now projects] Add subcommand alias for `now project` (#2750) Fixes #2162.
[now projects] Add subcommand alias for `now project` (#2750) Fixes #2162.
